date food

Landing page
about the project

With Date Food we are looking to promote the delivery of great food and a great experience. We take great care to cover the food and the personalities who create it in an entrancing manner. But we also make sure to make it easy to find out all about what to expect from the service and cuisine.

Industry: catering

Tech Stack: Project management, Back-end development, Ux/ui Designer, Front-end development, QA, DevOps

Mobile version

Naturally, a lot of people will try to look up the service on their mobile devices, so we make sure to translate all of the website’s features and design to each platform. Everything one would experience on the website will be just as clean on the phone.

How it works

To cover different preferences and budgets we prepared a complete interactive menu, allowing the customer choose exactly what they want for their venue.

culinary adventure

How it works
Typography & colors
black Apricot Peach Green
Result

With the interactive menu and all the information distinctly covered by the website, any potential customer can fully prepare what they need before they even get in touch with the staff. This will lead to a very all encompassing funnel to sell the service with very little effort.
